channel.description: Recent content in Tutorials on David Jorna

item.title: What is intranet?
item.description: Disclaimer: This post is sponsored by MyHub Intranet Solutions, an affiliate of Daikon Media, who were kind enough to review my indie game. However, I did my best to keep the content educational and objective, and I was not censored in any way. Intranet vs Internet You’re might be familiar with something called “the internet.” It surrounds us and penetrates us. It binds the galaxy together. But intranet is somewhat lesser-known.

item.title: Publish Your Unity Game to the App Store Without a Mac or an iPhone
item.description: I recently released the beta of my first mobile game, Juggl, for both Android an iOS. Not owning any Apple products besides an old iPod Nano, I found publishing to the App Store to be more difficult than I expected. It’s no wonder some indie devs neglect the App Store altogether to save themselves the headache of getting through Apple’s strict hardware requirements. This is unfortunate, because they’re missing out on a lot of potential revenue.
